SpeedTest by OpenSpeedTest.description:
SpeedTest by OpenSpeedTestâ„¢ is a free and open-source HTML5 network performance estimation tool. Written in vanilla Javascript it only uses built-in Web APIs like XMLHttpRequest (XHR), HTML, CSS, JS, & SVG. No third-party frameworks or libraries are required.

Based on the official docker image: https://hub.docker.com/r/openspeedtest/latest/, available for amd64 and arm64 architecture.
